notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: H.X. and S.P. proposed the concept and supervised the project. K.L. performed the first-principles calculations with the help from W.L. The group theory and kÂ· p analysis were carried out by K.L. with the help of W.L., J.J. and P.B. K.L. prepared the initial draft of the paper. All authors contributed to the writing and revision of the paper.
